==Notes==
* Each trial must be completed in 30 minutes or less
* After completing each trial at least once, a combat record will show on the trial page, showing several stats:
** Fastest clear time
** Strongest Single Strike
** Least DMG taken
** A stat unique to each trial
*** Thundershock Trial: Highest number of Electro-Charged Reactions (in one trial attempt)
*** Freezing Trial: Highest number of Freeze Reactions (in one trial attempt)
*** Windswept Trial: Highest number of Swirl Reactions (in one trial attempt)
*** Desirious Trial: Highest number of Elemental Burst uses (in one trial attempt)
*** Amplifying Trial: Highest number of Vaporize/Melt Reactions (in one trial attempt)
*** Transformative Trial: Highest number of Elemental Reactions (in one trial attempt)
*** Lightbringer Trial: Number of times cleared

==Trial Characters==
{{Main|Misty Dungeon/2021-12-17/Characters|l1=Characters}}
All Trial Characters are at Level 80 with fixed weapons and artifacts.

==Thundershock Trial==
[[File:Misty Dungeon 2021-12-17 Thundershock Trial.png|100px|thumb|right]]
{{Description|Here, {{Color|help|Electro-Charged}} not only receives a DMG Bonus, but will also increase the rate at which your Elemental Bursts can be used.}}
'''Ley Line Disorder:'''
* When Electro-Charged is triggered, all party members' Elemental Burst CDs are decreased by {{Color|help|1}}s. All of them will also restore {{Color|help|4}} Energy.<br />These effects can occur once every {{Color|help|3}}s.
* Electro-Charged DMG is increased by {{Color|help|100%}}/150%/200%/250%.<br />Complete the {{Color|Pyro|Plunder}} challenge during the trial to increase this DMG further.

'''Main Opponents:'''<br />
''Final Challenge (Level 90)''
* {{Enemy List|Stonehide Lawachurl;Blazing Axe Mitachurl|x=0}}
''Rune Challenge (Level 80)''
* {{Enemy List|Geovishap;Ruin Cruiser;Ruin Defender;Ruin Scout;Treasure Hoarders: Scout;Treasure Hoarders: Seaman;Treasure Hoarders: Handyman;Fatui Pyro Agent|x=0}}

==Desirious Trial==
[[File:Misty Dungeon 2021-12-17 Desirious Trial.png|100px|thumb|right]]
{{Description|All party members will recieve a buff when {{Color|help|Elemental Bursts}} are used, in accordance with their greatest wishes. Use Elemental Bursts as much as possible in this trial.}}
'''Ley Line Disorder:'''
* When characters use Elemental Bursts, all party members will gain {{Color|help|15%}}/20%/25%/30% Bonus Elemental Burst DMG for the duration of the trial. This bonus can be stacked {{Color|help|10}} times. Complete the {{Color|Pyro|Plunder}} challenge during the trial to increase the Elemental Burst DMG bonus gained.
* When characters use {{Color|help|10}} Elemental Burst(s), all part members will gain {{Color|help|20%}} Normal Attack SPD for the duration of this trial.

==Amplifying Trial==
[[File:Misty Dungeon 2021-12-17 Amplifying Trial.png|100px|thumb|right]]

'''Ley Line Disorder:'''
* Every time Melt and Vaporize is triggered, a shockwave will be triggered, dealing DMG over a large AoE. This effect can occur once every {{Color|help|3}}s. Complete the {{Color|Pyro|Plunder}} challenge during the trial to increase the DMG of such shockwaves further.

==Transformative Trial==
[[File:Misty Dungeon 2021-12-17 Transformative Trial.png|100px|thumb|right]]
{{Description|All party members will recieve a buff when {{Color|help|Superconduct}}, {{Color|help|Overloaded}}, {{Color|help|Swirl}}, and{{sic|<!--missing space-->|hide=1}}{{Color|help|Crystallize}} are triggered. Accumulate these advantages to break through this trial!}}
'''Ley Line Disorder:'''
* Every time Overloaded, Superconduct, Swirl, or Crystallize reaction is triggered, a DMG bonus will be gained based on the triggering element. the DMG bonus from these 4 reaction types have independent timers and can stack with each other. Max {{Color|help|4}} stacks. Each stack will increase DMG by {{Color|help|24%}}/36%/48%/60% and each stack lasts {{Color|help|8}}s. If you have already obtained a stack before, triggering the effect again will reset the duration remaining to {{Color|help|8}}s. Complete the {{Color|Pyro|Plunder}} challenge during the trial to increase the DMG bonus gained from each stack.

'''Main Opponents:'''<br />
''Final Challenge (Level 90)''
* {{Enemy List|Thunderhelm Lawachurl;Electro Samachurl;Cryo Hilichurl Shooter|x=0}}
''Rune Challenge (Level 80)''
* {{Enemy List|Electro Abyss Mage;Electro Samachurl;Electro Hilichurl Shooter;Hydro Specter;Geo Specter;Geovishap Hatchling;Geo Slime;Large Electro Slime|x=0}}
